A free software, global observation network for detecting censorship, surveillance and traffic manipulation on the internet.

Project.Describe the data being stored onto File: A free software, global observation network for detecting censorship, surveillance and traffic manipulation on the internet.
Project.How do you plan to prepare the dataset: First, I downloaded the dataset from https://repository.surfsara.nl/ and categorized it by collection. I then created different directories to categorize the files and packaged them into car files ranging in size from 17GB to 32GB. I then distributed them to the SP via HTTP for storage.
